news.title: ‘They don’t care about dogs or alarms’ – gardaí identify six nationwide burglary gangs working from Dublin and Kildare area
news.summary: Gardaí have identified six main burglary gangs that drive from their bases in Dublin and Kildare to break into homes and businesses nationwide.

news.title: MEP Seán Kelly defies party on Áras run as Fine Gael bosses back Heather Humphreys; Dr Tony Holohan drops presidential bid
news.summary: Fine Gael MEP Seán Kelly is defying the hopes of the party hierarchy for a single presidential candidate after refusing to clear the way for Heather Humphreys by ruling out a run for the Áras.

news.title: Zelensky says Russia ‘cynically’ attacking Ukraine ahead of US talks as Trump rules out country reclaiming Crimea
‘After surviving breast cancer, I accept I’ll never be the same person’
news.summary: Catriona O’Brien was lying in bed one night in late August 2022, when she noticed a pea-sized lump in her breast. A keen runner, at the time she had suffered a stress fracture in her foot.

news.title: Molly Martens discussed using night-vision camera in bedroom where husband Jason Corbett was killed
news.summary: Molly Martens spoke to neighbours about using night vision recording equipment in the master bedroom of her home, where she and her father Tom beat her husband, Jason Corbett, to death.

news.title: Palestinian ambassador backs Sally Rooney over Palestine Action comments
news.summary: Irish author Sally Rooney is using her voice to “call out human rights violations”, the Palestinian ambassador in Ireland said, after the novelist said she will continue to support and fund Palestine Action.

news.title: John Aldridge: I’m worried about one key aspect of this Liverpool team – Arne Slot needs a quick fix
news.summary: There was so much to unpick after an incredible opening night of the new Premier League season and not all of it was positive for Liverpool manager Arne Slot.

news.title: Man (60s) arrested, second man (50s) in critical condition after Co Mayo collision
news.summary: A motorcyclist aged in his 50s is in critical condition following a collision in Co Mayo yesterday, with a man in his 60s arrested in connection with the investigation.

news.title: Ask Allison: My relationship with my sisters has become more strained since they had children
news.summary: I have two sisters whom I love very much. We are all close in age, in our 30s and early 40s. We socialise a lot together and love visiting our family home. In the past three or four years, both of my sisters have had children.

news.title: Status Yellow thunderstorm warning to come into effect for three counties as power outages possible
news.summary: A Status Yellow thunderstorm warning will come into effect this morning in three counties due to the potential for lightning damage and power outages.
